name: part_010
file: tmp_【3Dお披露目】刮目せよ！吾輩の力を開放する時ッツ！！#ラプラス・ダークネス3D 【ラプラス・ダークネス⧸ホロライブ】 [V0Zk55CpFEM]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_010.mov

scenes.description: La+ Darknesss lies on the floor, complaining and jokingly asking her teammates to step on her as they leave.
A transition effect leading into the music performance segment.
La+ Darknesss performs a cover of the song 'Tatoeba' by 164.

subtitles.original: なんで、ひどい！ひどい、かえんないで！！
subtitles.english: Why, so mean! You're mean, don't go!!

subtitles.original: やだやだやだ... やだー...
subtitles.english: No no no... nooo...

subtitles.original: ひどい...
subtitles.english: Mean...

subtitles.original: 助けてくださ～い...
subtitles.english: Someone help me...
Waaaah...

subtitles.original: え、ほんとに踏んでくれないんですか？
subtitles.english: Eh, you're really not going to step on me?

subtitles.original: 貴方が願った幸せなど
subtitles.english: The happiness you wished for and such

subtitles.original: 当たり前のようなものだけど
subtitles.english: Is something that seems ordinary, but

subtitles.original: 何処にもないよと貴方は言う
subtitles.english: You say that it's nowhere to be found

subtitles.original: そんな世界がまた始まる
subtitles.english: Such a world begins again

subtitles.original: 例えば、今此処に置かれた花に / 作詞・作曲：164
subtitles.english: For example, to the flower placed here right now / Lyrics & Music: 164

subtitles.original: 今日も電車は遅れている
subtitles.english: Today too, the train is running late

subtitles.original: 僕の予定など知りもせずに
subtitles.english: Without even knowing my plans

subtitles.original: 欠伸を一つ二つ飲み込んで
subtitles.english: Swallowing one or two yawns

subtitles.original: 空に咲く雲が笑っている
subtitles.english: The clouds blooming in the sky are laughing

subtitles.original: 楽しそうに
subtitles.english: Happily

subtitles.original: 過ぎ去って行く装いの中へ
subtitles.english: Into the passing attire

subtitles.original: 積み上げた思い出一つとならない
subtitles.english: Not even one of the piled-up memories remains

subtitles.original: 旅立つ貴方への舌打ちの中
subtitles.english: Amidst the tongue-clicking directed at you who is departing

subtitles.original: 今日も変わらず世界は回る
subtitles.english: Today too, the world continues to turn as usual

subtitles.original: ビルの隙間から顔を覗く
subtitles.english: Peeking out from between the buildings

subtitles.original: お天道様が照らしている
subtitles.english: The sun is shining down

subtitles.original: 悲しそうに風に揺られながら
subtitles.english: Swaying sadly in the wind

subtitles.original: 道行く人は通り過ぎて行く
subtitles.english: People on the street pass by

subtitles.original: 貴方がどれだけの痛みを抱え
subtitles.english: How much pain you carried

subtitles.original: 背負って悩んで苦しんだのだろうか
subtitles.english: Bearing it, worrying, and suffering, I wonder

subtitles.original: 例えば、今此処に置かれた花に
subtitles.english: For example, to the flower placed here right now

subtitles.original: 白々しくて手を合わせる僕には解るのでしょうか
subtitles.english: Can I, who shamelessly join my hands in prayer, truly understand?

subtitles.original: 貴方が願った幸せなど
subtitles.english: The happiness you wished for and such

subtitles.original: 当たり前のようなものだけど
subtitles.english: Is something that seems ordinary, but

subtitles.original: 何処にもないよと貴方は言う
subtitles.english: You say that it's nowhere to be found

subtitles.original: こんな世界は沈んで行く
subtitles.english: Such a world is sinking down

subtitles.original: 過ぎ去って行く装いの中へ
subtitles.english: Into the passing attire

subtitles.original: 積み上げた思い出一つとならない
subtitles.english: Not even one of the piled-up memories remains

subtitles.original: 旅立つ貴方への舌打ちの中今日も...
subtitles.english: Amidst the tongue-clicking directed at you who is departing, today too...
